pr_title: Fix #1341: Course header too small for title

timeline.message:
Fix #1341: Course header too small for title

- Update Breakpoints: 4 cols xl, 3 cols ls, 2 cols md, 1 col sm
- Make hight in course card dynamic (60px - 100px, before fix 60px) to make room for very long titles.
- Clean up unneeded div.

Signed-off-by: Jan Philip Bernius <janphilip.bernius@tum.de>

timeline.bodyText:
We can increase the min-height a bit if we want all cards to have the same header height. 80px would be a good value for this case.
However, I think the super thick headers do not look very nice. Open for other opinions!
